name: @discord-additions/components
description: Some helpful additions to make creating components easier.

scripts.prepublishOnly: rm -rf build && tsc && npm run fix-js && echo finished
scripts.fix-js: sed -i '/__exportStar(require(".\/util\/types"), exports);/d' build/index.js && cp src/util/types.d.ts build/util

author: Donovan Daniels <hewwo@yiff.rocks>
